body.name: USB Microphone, PC Microphone,Tripod Stand,Adjustable RGB Modes & Brightness,Quick Mute,Gain Control,for Streaming, Podcasting, Recording, PS4/5 Desktop,Chat

features: 【Easy Plug&Play Setup】This USB gaming microphone for computer is ready to use with Computer, Laptop, PC, Windows, Mac OS, PS4, and PS5 right out of the box. Ideal for conference, distance learning, streaming, chatting, podcasting, recording, Zoom, Skype, YouTube video, etc. no any additional driver is required.

【Vivid & Clear original sound enjoyment 】Designed for streaming microphone gamer, the built-in PC mic capsule offers clear and full sound. That pop filter mount on computer microphone USB dampens vibration to clean noises from your podcasting, obviously improved sound quality. Working with upgraded USB condenser microphone capsule, can better achieve energetic and warm vocal. no matter it is PS5 or PC gaming, That will sound like your whole team members are playing side by side.

【Gradient RGB & Quick Mute】 Bicolored RGB lighting alters 11 color modes itself gradiently, your game video or live streaming will be more rainbow. You can immediately mute USB gaming mic when you concentrate on the game via the quick mute button. This top RED LED will be on when the USB microphone is muted, This Blue LED will be on when the microphone is monitor.

【Top microphone volume adjustment knob & Bottom ear phone volume adjustment knob】Gaming microphone has volume adjustment knob+bottom ear phone volume adjustment knob. If game sound affects your voice, you can instantly adjust the volume from computer microphone for podcast instead. Thumbscrew on the desktop microphone helps you tilt the best streaming recording angle in advance, to get a pleasant speaking posture during games or streaming.

【Built-in anti-vibration mount & Detachable pop filter】Built-in anti-vibratio mount - You can pull the PC microphone near by your mouth when using, USB microphone are firmly clamped on the shock mount, which will reduce vibration noise caused by violently knocking keyboard and clicking mouse which can eliminate pops sound produced by your exciting words during game for clear audio gaming singing recording.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very user friendly
reviews.reviewText: I must admit that I am a bit of a technophobe. I usually try to avoid new tech stuff and I try to stick to my old chrome book and regular smartphone. I finally decided to upgrade my microphone for my online meetings, but I was focused on ease of use instead of sound quality. Thankfully, this is the best of both worlds. It's so user friendly that all I have to do is plug it into the USB port on the side of my chrome book and it's ready to go. The sound is great and it comes with some extras. The set includes a tripod that is very sturdy and can be moved in all directions. It also comes with a pop filter that is removable if you want and the microphone itself lights up and changes colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better priced Xcloud clone
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. so im a streamer and content creator , and i have many mic setups for diffent things , the one i was previously using was a Blue yeti snowball. its a bit old at this point, it works but its just old ugly and plain just didnt fit my upgraded setup .eventually i looked at the cloudX mic with RGB because my brother recomended it to me as a fellow streamer but it was too expensive for my needs right now so i eventually founmd this .its looks almost exactly like the CloudX mic which is nice, it has RGB you can cycle through or turn off if its annoying you , a mesh grill that i guess is a pop filter . it even has the same tap to mute on top of it which i was really happy about .Overall the sound is good, it can be set to 24bit which is amazing honestly and it also had a headphone monitor jack that i think more companies should have that can also be controlled directly on the mic (aswel as the mic volume itself)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great For Gamers
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this microphone for gaming. The sound quality is great for the price especially since it comes with a pop filter its also extremely easy to use all you have to do is plug in the USB the RGB lightning also looks very nice and completes my setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t Connect to MacBooks
reviews.reviewText: I have a MacBook Air 2020 and it wouldn’t connect. It came nicely in box and gave detailed instructions, definitely seems like a nice mic. But when I went to my settings sound input to connect it my Mac couldn’t even find it with it plugged in. Disappointed:(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This microphone is fine, but not for every application
reviews.reviewText: I bought this microphone for a specific application and unfortunately it did not work for this, my fault. The microphone worked perfectly, the leds worked great. The quality was good for the money. I had no problems with the item itself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great beginner mic
reviews.reviewText: I've never used a mic before but to me this one seems very professional. It has a mic screen to stop sound popping and I also really like the rubberband design that allows you to swivel the mic to a different angle. It also comes with an RGB strip but I'm not sure what's the purpose for its inclusion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Voice sounds good
reviews.reviewText: I got it on the sale so I think the money really worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent microphone~ And the color is cooool!
